definitions.definition: A partnership contract between two or more parties.
A form of partnership where one partner promises to buy the equity share of the other partner gradually.

accounting_treatments.title: Initial Recognition
accounting_treatments.content: The partner's share in Musharaka capital shall be recognized when payment is made.

accounting_treatments.title: Profit Distribution
accounting_treatments.content: Profits shall be recognized based on the agreed profit-sharing ratio.
